segment_user_id.title: Segment User Id
segment_user_id.description: The User UUID with which to track events in Segment. If not present, then reporting is disabled. See https://community.faros.ai/docs/telemetry for more details.

community_graphql_batch_size.title: GraphQL mutation batch size
community_graphql_batch_size.description: Maximum number of mutations to execute in a single request to GraphQL backend.

api_key.title: API Key
api_key.description: The Faros API key to use to access the API.

graphql_api.title: GraphQL API
graphql_api.description: The version of GraphQL API for writes.

cloud_graphql_upsert_batch_size.title: GraphQL upsert batch size
cloud_graphql_upsert_batch_size.description: Maximum number of records to execute in a single GraphQL upsert.

cloud_graphql_batch_size.title: GraphQL mutation batch size
cloud_graphql_batch_size.description: Maximum number of mutations to execute in a single request to GraphQL backend.

check_connection.title: Check Faros API Connection
check_connection.description: Check Faros API connection on init.

expiration.title: Revision expiration
expiration.description: The Faros graph revision expiration time.

origin.title: Origin name
origin.description: The Faros origin name used for uploaded entries. Must be unique.

dry_run.title: Dry run
dry_run.description: Process all input records but avoid writing into Faros API

invalid_record_strategy.title: Invalid record strategy
invalid_record_strategy.description: Strategy to follow to handle an invalid input record.

jsonata_expression.title: JSONata expression
jsonata_expression.description: JSONata expression for converting input records. If provided applies the expression based on specified JSONata apply mode.

jsonata_mode.title: JSONata apply mode
jsonata_mode.description: JSONata apply mode when converting input records.

jsonata_destination_models.title: JSONata destination models
jsonata_destination_models.description: Destination models when using JSONata expression.

source_specific_configs.title: Source-specific configs
source_specific_configs.description: Configuration options that apply to specific sources.

source.title: Agile Accelerator
source.description: Configuration options that apply to records generated by the Agile Accelerator Source.

max_description_length.title: Max Description Length
max_description_length.description: Value to cut description to specific length

work_additional_fields.title: Work Additional Fields
work_additional_fields.description: Fields to save to tms_Task's additionalFields variable

source.description: Configuration options that apply to records generated by the Backlog Source.

max_description_length.title: Max Description Length
max_description_length.description: Value to cut description to specific length

source.description: Configuration options that apply to records generated by the Bitbucket Source.

application_mapping.title: Application Mapping
application_mapping.description: JSON map of Bitbucket service(s) name, to compute platform specific app name and platform name. Used to reference compute_Application object, from an ims_Incident object.

source.description: Configuration options that apply to records generated by the Datadog Source.

application_mapping.title: Application Mapping
application_mapping.description: JSON map of Datadog service(s) name, to compute platform specific app name and platform name. Used to reference compute_Application object, from an ims_Incident object.

default_severity.title: Default Severity
default_severity.description: A default severity category if not present

source.description: Configuration options that apply to records generated by the Docker Source.

label_prefix.title: Label Prefix
label_prefix.description: Label prefix used to construct build key and commit key for cicd_Artifact and cicd_ArtifactCommitAssociation from labels. Every label key start with this prefix. If the prefix is 'faros-', then the label keys will be 'faros-build-id', 'faros-pipeline-id', etc.

skip_tags.title: Skip tags
skip_tags.description: The images with the listed tags will be ignored by the feed

organization.title: Organization
organization.description: Organization name to associate with image tags

source.description: Configuration options that apply to records generated by the Jenkins Source.

create_commit_records.title: Create Commit Records
create_commit_records.description: Create vcs_Commit records from Jenkins builds

source.description: Configuration options that apply to records generated by the Jira Source.

use_board_ownership.title: Use Board Ownership
use_board_ownership.description: Use Jira boards for assigning owners of tasks, or use projects.

truncate_limit.title: Truncate Limit
truncate_limit.description: Truncate the descriptions of projects, tasks, and epics.

exclude_fields.title: Exclude Fields
exclude_fields.description: List of fields to exclude when saving tasks. Defaults to no exclusions.

additional_fields_array_limit.title: Additional Fields Array Limit
additional_fields_array_limit.description: Truncates an additional field's array value to the given length.

source.description: Configuration options that apply to records generated by the PagerDuty Source.

application_mapping.title: Application Mapping
application_mapping.description: JSON map of PagerDuty service(s) name, to compute platform specific app name and platform name. Used to reference compute_Application object, from an ims_Incident object.

default_severity.title: Default Severity
default_severity.description: A default severity category if not present

source.description: Configuration options that apply to records generated by the Phabricator Source.

max_description_length.title: Max Description Length
max_description_length.description: Value to cut description to specific length

source.description: Configuration options that apply to records generated by the ServiceNow Source.

application_mapping.title: Application Mapping
application_mapping.description: JSON map of ServiceNow service(s) name, to compute platform specific app name and platform name. Used to reference compute_Application object, from an ims_Incident object.

application_field.title: Application Field
application_field.description: Field name in a ServiceNow incident, to compute a Faros Application name. The value of this field will be used to look up the app/platform in the specified application mapping

default_severity.title: Default Severity
default_severity.description: A default severity category if not present

default_priority.title: Default Priority
default_priority.description: A default priority category if not present

source.description: Configuration options that apply to records generated by the SquadCast Source.

application_mapping.title: Application Mapping
application_mapping.description: JSON map of SquadCast service(s) name, to compute platform specific app name and platform name. Used to reference compute_Application object, from an ims_Incident object.

source.description: Configuration options that apply to records generated by the Statuspage Source.

application_mapping.title: Application Mapping
application_mapping.description: JSON map of Statuspage service(s) name, to compute platform specific app name and platform name. Used to reference compute_Application object, from an ims_Incident object.

source.description: Configuration options that apply to records generated by the VictorOps Source.

application_mapping.title: Application Mapping
application_mapping.description: JSON map of VictorOps service(s) name, to compute a Faros Application and Platform name. Used to reference compute_Application object, from an ims_Incident object. If specified, and such service exists, the feed will write a compute_Application object.

application_field.title: Application Field
application_field.description: Field name in a VictorOps incident, to compute a Faros Application name. The value of this field will be used to look up the app/platform in the specified application mapping

source.description: Configuration options that apply to records generated by the FireHydrant Source.

application_mapping.title: Application Mapping
application_mapping.description: JSON map of FireHydrant service(s) name, to compute platform specific app name and platform name. Used to reference compute_Application object, from an ims_Incident object.

max_description_length.title: Max Description Length
max_description_length.description: Value to cut description to specific length

source.description: Configuration options that apply to records generated by the Azure Pipeline Source.

application_mapping.title: Azure pipeline Application Mapping
application_mapping.description: JSON map of Azure Pipeline service(s) name, to compute platform specific app name and platform name. Used to reference compute_Application object, from an cicd_Deployment object.

source.description: Configuration options that apply to records generated by the OpsGenie Source.

max_description_length.title: Max Description Length
max_description_length.description: Value to cut description to specific length

application_mapping.title: Application Mapping
application_mapping.description: JSON map of OpsGenie service(s) name, to compute a Faros Application and Platform name. Used to reference compute_Application object, from an ims_Incident object. If specified, and such service exists, the feed will write a compute_Application object.

source.description: Configuration options that apply to records generated by the BambooHR Source.

bootstrap_teams_from_managers.title: Bootstrap Teams From Managers
bootstrap_teams_from_managers.description: Assign employees to teams based off their managers.

inactive_employment_history_status.title: Inactive employmentHistoryStatus
inactive_employment_history_status.description: Values of employmentHistoryStatus that are equivalent to an employee being inactive

keep_alive.title: HTTP Keep Alive
keep_alive.description: Should keep connection between client and server alive
